title: Environmental Benefits
description: Net-negative carbon emissions, air quality improvements, and water protection through complete nutrient recovery

items.title: Net-Negative Carbon Emissions
items.description: System removes more greenhouse gases than it emits through stable carbon sequestration and fossil fuel displacement.
details: Significant fossil fuel displacement through RNG
High carbon stability over long time periods
Significant CO₂ removed per tonne biochar produced

items.title: Air Quality Improvements
items.description: Dramatic reduction in harmful emissions improving health for workers, animals, and communities.
details: Major reduction in ammonia emissions with biochar bedding
Significant reduction in nitrous oxide from soils
Improved air quality in poultry houses
Better respiratory health for birds and workers

items.title: Water Quality Protection
items.description: Complete nutrient recovery prevents groundwater contamination and watershed impairment.
details: High phosphorus recovery across all products

items.title: Waste Elimination
items.description: Complete conversion of poultry waste to valuable products with no disposal needed.
details: Every component of waste becomes valuable product

items.title: Soil Health Enhancement
items.description: Biochar improves soil structure, water retention, and microbial activity for long-term agricultural benefits.
details: Reduced need for pesticides and fertilizers
